caption.center: IN THE INTEREST OF: M.D. AND A.C., MINORS, v. B.D.K., ET AL.,

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District,

opinion.attorneys:
Patrick D. Billington, Alan D. Arand, Union, Gael D. Wood, Washington, for appellant.Page 871
Prudence Fink Johnson, John R. O'Connor, Union, for respondent.
opinion.panel: Before CRAHAN, P.J., and CRANDALL and DOWD, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: [2] Mother appeals the judgments of the trial court terminating her parental rights as to her children M.D. and A.C. Father appeals the judgments terminating his parental rights as to M.D. We affirm. The judgments of the trial court are supported by substantial evidence and are not against the weight of the evidence; no error of law appears. An extended opinion would have no precedential value. Rule 84.16(b).
